Description: Red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, with remains of six lines of black-painted demotic text on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Kaplony-Heckel 1963a / Die demotischen Tempeleide I: Text (p.50-51)
Kaplony-Heckel 1963b / Die demotischen Tempeleide II: Abbildungen (p.12)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (50426) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/50426)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
